thread.title: He's going to Barcelona! Fans react on Twitter as Coutinho signs new Liverpool contract
thread.title_full: He's going to Barcelona! Fans react on Twitter as Coutinho signs new Liverpool contract

title: He's going to Barcelona! Fans react on Twitter as Coutinho signs new Liverpool contract
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership He's going to Barcelona! Fans react on Twitter as Coutinho signs new Liverpool contract PHILIPPE COUTINHO has signed a new Liverpool contract making him the club's highest-paid player on around £150,000-a-week, but fans aren't convinced he'll stay at Anfield for much longer. PUBLISHED: 09:24, Wed, Jan 25, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:46, Wed, Jan 25, 2017 Fans react on Twitter as Philippe Coutinho signs new Liverpool contract Wed, January 25, 2017 Philippe Coutinho has agreed a new contract with Liverpool keeping him at the club until 2022, but fans are not convinced he'll hang around that long Liverpool FC via Getty Images 1 of 15 Fans react on Twitter as Philippe Coutinho signs a new Liverpool contract 
The 24-year-old Brazilian has penned a deal to keep him at Liverpool until 2022 , with the extension coming into effect on July 1, 2017. 
Fans have been quick to point out the similarities between Coutinho's new deal and that which Luis Suarez signed in December 2013, just months before agreeing a £75m move to Barcelona. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see some of the best reactions on Twitter to Coutinho's new deal. Related articles
